metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Shadow's Theme - Final Fantasy VI has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion: Shadow's Theme - Final Fantasy VI has sections analyzed in the following keys: E Minor,  and E Dorian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
